genresAdvancedInfo.name: hindi worship
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Hindi worship is a genre of devotional music that is popular in India. It features traditional Indian instruments, such as the sitar and tabla, and Hindi lyrics that praise and worship God. The genre has a calming and meditative quality and is often used in religious ceremonies and festivals. Hindi worship music has a rich cultural and spiritual significance in India and is deeply ingrained in the country's religious traditions.
